I suspect the people who would like the error messages translated  won't be found on an English email list.   Not a big deal, just something to consider...
- Tod

Jim Cheesman wrote:

>
> I'd be inclined to agree with Vladimir - I don't think that there are
> really enough messages within JUnit to make it that useful. (Not to mention
> that to program in java you need to know a certain amount of English anyway
> - all the JFCs have English names...) Of course, documentation is another
> matter...  Or is that what you are referring to?
>
> Jim
